charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is committed to the custody of the BOP for a term of FIFTY-FOUR (54) MONTHS, as to each Count 2, 3, and 4, said counts to run concurrently with each other, with credit for time served. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be placed on supervised release for a term of LIFE as to each Count 2, 3, and 4, said counts to run concurrently with each other.

charges.charge_description: 18:2252A(a)(5)(B) and (b)(2) Knowing Access of Child Pornography(4)
